0871A46B.Toast: A priest from the Cathedral of Light needs assistance with a dangerous task.

259D49BB.Phase15Description: The exorcism was a success, and the boy will recover in time. Being this close to such a potent ritual was impressive.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Sister Octavia, a priest from the Cathedral of Light has asked for my help with a ritual to exorcise a demon from a young boy.
